title: @measure_bb_thick
description: Compute thickness of mask using ball and box method

surfset.title: Surface dataset
surfset.description: Surface dataset onto which to map thickness (e.g., pial/gray matter surface)

resample.title: Resample
resample.description: Resample input to mm in millimeters (e.g., half a voxel or 'auto'). No resampling is done by default.

increment.title: Increment
increment.description: Test thickness at increments of sub-voxel distance. Default is 1/4 voxel minimum distance (in-plane).

surfsmooth.title: Surface smooth
surfsmooth.description: Smooth surface map of thickness by mm millimeters. Default is 6 mm.

smoothmm.title: Volume smooth
smoothmm.description: Smooth volume by mm FWHM in mask. Default is 2*voxelsize of mask or resampled mask.

maxthick.title: Maximum thickness
maxthick.description: Search for maximum thickness value of mm millimeters. Default is 6 mm.

depth_search.title: Depth search
depth_search.description: Map to surface by looking for max along mm millimeter normal vectors. Default is 3 mm.

keep_temp_files.title: Keep temp files flag
keep_temp_files.description: Do not delete the intermediate files (for testing)

balls_only.title: Balls only flag
balls_only.description: Calculate only with spheres and skip boxes

surfsmooth_method.title: Surface smooth method
surfsmooth_method.description: Heat method used for smoothing surfaces. Default is HEAT_07 but HEAT_05 is also useful for models.
